name: IntravenousChemotherapy
title: Intravenous Chemotherapy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The administration of chemotherapeutic agents for the treatment of cancer via intravenous (IV) route.),(Data Element Scope: Includes that the procedure of  administering IV chemotherapy is performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chemotherapy administered via IV push, infusion),(Exclusion Criteria: Chemotherapy administered orally. Radiation treatment)

contains.display: Intravenous chemotherapy administration by push technique (procedure)
Chemotherapy administration; intravenous, push technique, single or initial substance/drug
Administration of chemotherapy into vein using push technique
Chemotherapy administration; intravenous, push technique, each additional substance/drug (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
Administration of additional new drug or substance into vein using push technique
Chemotherapy administration, intravenous infusion technique; up to 1 hour, single or initial substance/drug
Administration of chemotherapy into vein, 1 hour or less
Chemotherapy administration, intravenous infusion technique; each additional hour (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
Administration of chemotherapy into vein, each additional hour
Chemotherapy administration, intravenous infusion technique; initiation of prolonged chemotherapy infusion (more than 8 hours), requiring use of a portable or implantable pump
Administration of prolonged chemotherapy into vein
Chemotherapy administration, intravenous infusion technique; each additional sequential infusion (different substance/drug), up to 1 hour (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
Administration of additional new drug or substance into vein, 1 hour or less
